SurfingFestival.title: Surfing Festival Letter
SurfingFestival.text: Dear @,^This week we'll be hosting a Surfing Festival down by the beach. If you are interested in competing Gus has put together a small cash prize for the winner from the Saloon's proceeds.^We're also asking all of the townsfolk to bring 50 wood to help contribute to a bonfire.^Looking forward to your attendance.^-Mayor Lewis
